name: Cave Troll
description: The Cave Troll is a large, hulking giant known for its immense strength and resilience. It has a solid build, with an appearance characteristic of trolls: greenish skin and a brutish physique.
memorable: Cave Trolls can regenerate health and control their severed limbs, making them persistent threats even when injured.
goals: The Cave Troll typically seeks to dominate its territory and ambush unsuspecting adventurers.
relations: Cave Trolls may be encountered alongside other cave-dwelling creatures or as guardians of underground lairs.
environment: Cave Trolls are often found in dark, damp caves or subterranean environments.
strengths: High Constitution grants exceptional resilience; possesses the ability to regenerate health.
weaknesses: Weakness to radiant damage and sunlight disables its regeneration.
attacks: The troll uses powerful melee attacks with its bite and claws and can hurl rocks effectively.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration allows it to recover 10 hit points at the start of its turn, unless affected by radiant damage.
senses: The Cave Troll has blindsight within 120 feet, enabling it to sense creatures without sight.
skills: The troll is skilled in Stealth, making it effective for ambush tactics.
additional_information: Keen Smell grants advantage on Perception checks based on smell.
Severed Limbs ability allows it to control lost body parts in combat.
Average Dexterity allows it some ability to dodge attacks.
Possesses heavy melee damage output with multiple attack options.
Low Intelligence and Charisma reduce its effectiveness in social situations.
